original_title: 女たちの都～ワッゲンオッゲン～
overview: Ushibuka in Amakusa City prospered a century ago with its fishing industry and red-light district, but has become Japan's fastest declining city. Homemaker Yumie wants to revive the town she loves, and invites her friends to realize an unusual plan at a former brothel built a century ago.
title: Women's Dream of Amakusa: Revitalizing Geisha Town
